short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LockDown Browser is a custom browser that locks down the exam environment within specific learning and assesment systems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mastery Connect LockDown Browser is a custom browser extension that protects the integrity of the exam process by preventing cheating by students while the exam is in session.
